resources:
Fortune Cookies Subscribe, buddy! Cookie widget Shake device to get cookies! Error happens while connecting to your accelerometer Yeah baby! It works! Shake device to calibrate or tap screen to set default value Calibration completed! Shake more to get cookies! Something goes wrong. Check your Internet connection Cookies are ready! Back SETTINGS <--> Calibrate About cookies TUTORIAL <--> Shake Choose one Tap it Move halves aside Tap paper to zoom Next prophecy will be able after 4 hours ABOUT <--> Random prophecies Money prophecies Warnings Love prophecies Success prophecies MONEY <-->
Today is a good day to spend money.
Savings may increase, but do not play poker.
There is a chance of winning the lottery.. all who plays has it..
A great day for a treasure hunt .
Invest in the oil industry.. or do not invest.
The best investment - an investment in pleasure. :)
Start saving money.
Make paper airplanes and launch them - they will bring someone money.
Be compliant
Avoid the temptation
Think about your costs
You save too much
The harder you work, the richer you will become
You are able to earn and save money - do it!
You will be successful in your work
Mountains of gold waiting for you! But the dragon guarding them..
Good day to spend money.
You will inherit a lot of money !
Soon you will get a chance to become a great man
You must do what you can do
Your success will surprise everyone!
Your best tool for extracting money - your mind!
New dating beneficial impact on your income
Money, money, money must be funny…” (*o *)
Plan your spending to increase revenues
Remember - money is only a means, not a goal!
Every woodcutter has his own axe. Where is yours?
Take another look at your life and you will find reduntant
Ready to action today
WARNINGS <-->
Beware bananas!
Avoid contacts with unknown baskets!
Do not trust anyone. Especially giraffes!
Deny all offers to fly into black hole!
Careful on the roads.
Be polite with others.
Beware the Black.. Cats.
Be vigilant - KGB spies everywhere.
Avoid noisy companies.
Avoid conflicts.
Be careful with utensils.
Be careful when you hammer a nail, always..
Check your health.
Afraid butterflies.. Caterpillars do not change in the soul..
Good luck, you were looking for was in the other cookies
The worst thing in aging, is the smell..
Be careful! You can be deceived today.
Do not scare your eloquence of others - be easier. ^^
Watch out! You will find a wonderful day!
Soon your wishes will come true!
Give attention to an old friend.
You should think about the future.
Soon life will be more interesting! Eeeeee.. ^^
Doubtful one can be the enemy in camouflage.
True friendship just need time, not money.
If you like challenges - like the consequences.
You must be willing to take responsibility for your actions.
You will always be surrounded by true friends, if you will cherish them.
You will be accompanied by good luck in all your endeavors.
Do not bite dogs today. And tomorrow too…
Seven times to cut and the sausage will end
If the falling star grow bigger - run!
Stop peck people and your beak will be gone
If you will make iron red-hot, it will become fragile
Dont mess with a beaver!
LOVE <-->
Be careful with kisses! They may be very hot ^^
Be prepared for the unexpected kiss!
More chances to meet your soul mate.
Expand your feelings, if they are absent - encroach cookies.
You will find a love at first sight.
Fabulous success awaits you - look around!
You will live your life with a man (or woman) of your dreams.
You will find a surprise kiss in an unexpected place.
Luck smile upon you, if you will love one person.
Love is everywhere! ^^
You attract a lot of people - carefully, handsome! :)
Love guides you in a new direction.
Be friendly with a counter.
You have the power to write your own destiny.
Tudu - duu-duu -duu.. Tudu du.. Tuuuuu, du! (^ o ^)
You will find your ideal. However, perhaps this person will be a dwarf.
Look for your love even in dreams!
Be humble, and people reach you if you will have a yacht
Your manners costs more than jewels
You depend on your second half.. and this is good. ^^
Your ideal is within your reach!
Your infinite patience will be rewarded sooner or later.
Wait for the arrival of unrequited love.
Your family life will be full of happiness and borsch.
Your mind is the strongest love narcotic!
Think before catch hot stuff!
If you want hear fortune is knocking at your door just fix your bell
It is not over yet. Just wait a bit
Look straight - people do not like chameleons
Love bites only when you keep it aside
Stronger than tea could be only hugs ^^
Best moment of your life can happen anytime - be ready!
Do not lick everything when you have a candy
Best love declarations are spontaneous^^
Do not check for a strength your relationships
Let go all your sorrows as fast as you can
You are not a fish, so just talk what you thinking about!
SUCCESS <-->
Risk is for the optimists!
No pain - no gain.
Keep your faith and dreams will come true.
Stop thinking – start doing!
Stay at your way!
Take a rest - you deserve it.
Happiness right before you.
To achieve success you need to refrain. But dont forget about toilet!
Catch something up! Immediately! Or drink a cup of tea
Your boss think bad about you – strike back!
Success awaits, stars smiles to you
Life is a fairytale
Surprises in all capitals of the world!
The way to your dream is open!
You are lucky! So be patient and stop take lucky tickets
Take a look asides when you cross the road - the faith is near.
Today is the best day! Such as another ones!
A sharp turn is near!
At first take care about yourself, then about another ones-
Your plans can be hard to be realised, but it worth it!-
Be thankful even if your life is not ideal-
Your talent will be cracked as a nut, but you will succeed!
Endure little less, and your problems will go away
If possibilities dont knock at your life, you need to make a door
Love and success step forward side by side! To the depths…
Your own mistakes make you smarter. And today you will get a lot of knowledge.
If you are happy, you are successful too!
To find success find yourself first
You need to make right solution – dragons are near!
Inspiration is near, and success with it!
If you like cookies, you will be successful!^^
Try something new - it will help you in your goals
Focus. If you can not do this - change camera
If the sea is calm it is time to row
If your glass is empty it is a time to fill it
Stop think much, you can go crazy
If you want to get inside, you have to twist off a cap
Make yourself want do your job
Think about learning new language
Dont look for happiness in main - watch closer to the trifles
Watch your steps while climbing to the top
Bananas, blackberries, strawberries, ice-cream, chocolate…
Hold your knowledge, but do not use glow
Man has no wings, but he has arms - use them to fly
Make yourself up after sleep! Dont like – dont sleep!
Stop smoking! No smoking - no stoping…
You need to change your ration
Pricking things are better not to be swallowed.
You need a good rest
Cottage cheese, kefir, meat, buckwheat…
Protein, protein, protein, protein…
Remember to brush your teeth, you are not a shark^^
More seafood
It is never too late for a diet!
Go for a walk
More walk
Take a fresh breath
Sport is not for everyone, but exactly for you!
Healthy glow still nobody harmed!
Smoking - health breaking!
Late to grow slim for a summer? New Year awaits!
The bigger the body - then louder it falls. But running is not bad anywhere
Fall down and wrung!
Fingers do not have muscles, stop clicking!
